https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6TbmALbiJNDsEGAmse0Yzp4PDjF.jpg Alesha Popovich has to catch Tugarin Zmey and bring back the stolen money with the help of a talking Horse (which talks all the time and has an opinion on everything), a wise granny, a donkey and a beauty Lyubava.
